type: Legendary Creature – Human Mercenary Lord Demigod
rules_text:
Whenever this creature transforms, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
Trample
[i]Wield Ragnell[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, forge, then if you control a legendary Equipment, destroy target nonland permanent.
[i]Ascension[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Attach any number of target Aura and Equipment to Ike, Ranger Paragon, then move any number of counters from permanents you control onto him.
